definition: alveolar/front part of the alveolar ridge

sentences.english: It also helps relieve toothaches and gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 它還有助於緩解牙痛和齒齦炎。

sentences.english: A parulis, or gum boil, may be present near the involved tooth .
sentences.chinese: 在患病牙齒附近可見齒齦膿腫或齒齦癤。

sentences.english: A parulis, or gum boil, may be present near the involved tooth .
sentences.chinese: 在患病牙齒附近可見齒齦膿腫或齒齦癤。

sentences.english: How your gums have shrunk since your teeth were extracted.
sentences.chinese: 你的牙拔掉後，齒齦收縮了不少。

sentences.english: The toothbrush gently removes plaque without damaging the gums.
sentences.chinese: 這種牙刷可以溫和去除牙菌斑而不損傷齒齦。

sentences.english: My part that protrudes from the gum has a "skin" of enamel .
sentences.chinese: 在我突出於齒齦的部分有一層琺琅“皮”。

sentences.english: She applied some ointment to ripen the abscesses on the gums.
sentences.chinese: 她塗了點藥膏使齒齦膿腫成熟以便去膿。

sentences.english: You can't reach the tight spaces between your teeth or under your gumline with a toothbrush.
sentences.chinese: 用牙刷刷牙時，很難刷到牙縫和齒齦線部位。
